attributes.action: give a knighthood to Kenny Dalglish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For his Services to football, both club and country.

The amazing way he carried Liverpool Football Club through the Hillsborough disaster, through to the present day.

His charity work with his wife Marina.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
